title: Julius and the Watchmaker
description: A lost diaryA spinning pocketwatchA gentleman wielding a deadly walking caneAnd a boy who's about to embark on the adventure of a lifetimeWhen Julius Higgins isn't running from Crimper McCready and his gang of bullies he's working in his grandfather's bookshop in Ironmonger Lane.Until Jack Springheel, a mysterious clock collector, turns up looking for the fabled diary of John Harrisonâ€”the greatest watchmaker of all time.Before he knows it, Julius becomes a thief and a runaway and makes a deal with Springheel that he will live to regret. And all before he finds out that Harrison's diary is really an instruction manual for making a time machine.
author: Tim Hehir
